pages.text: $(#630000)Under normal circumstances, a parasite will create a Dispatcher Nidus occasionally once it reaches 15 kills. This is not only unreliable, however, but it also takes a long time to get them to do it, and unfortunately it appears I can't make my own this way.

$(#630000)Instead, I can craft a Nidus Accumulator and feed it the kills instead. Nidus Accumulators will store any kills I obtain as I travel, transforming into a Dispatcher Nidus once I collect 15. It only works in the hotbar.
